options.name: Shocktrooper
options.description: You have been trained in armor usage and close combat. Gain +1 Might and +1 Movement Speed in Armor.

options.name: Free Action : Juggernaut Charge
options.description: Directly after moving 3 or more units in a straight line towards a creature that is no more than 1 size larger than you, you slam your body into them using your Might kill as the attack, dealing 1d4 damage and knocking them prone on a success.

options.name: Free Action : Weapon Bash
options.description: You make a melee attack against an adjacent creature with the butt of a Ranged Weapon. The target must make a concentration check against your attack or become dazed.

options.name: Tough
options.description: Your training has instilled you with a toughness. Gain +1 Resilience and +1 Health.

options.name: Action : Sweeping Shot
options.description: You make three, quick attacks at up to 3 creatures within your optimal range, using the 2nd highest dice as your attack score. If you only roll 1 dice as part of this attack, use a static value of 3 as your attack score.

options.name: Action : Press the Attack
options.description: You make an attack with a Ranged or Heavy Ranged weapon against a creature that is either dazed or stunned, dealing an extra dice of damage.

options.name: Trained Trooper
options.description: You have advanced training in close and ranged combat. Gain +1 skill with Ranged and Melee Weapons.

options.name: Damage Control
options.description: Gain +1 Kinetic, Cold, Heat and Electrical Mitigation while wearing Armor.

options.name: Intimidating
options.description: You are an imposing figure. Gain +1 Presence. Once per day in response to making a Presence check to intimidate, you can declare it in Impact roll.

options.name: Shock and Awe
options.description: On the first round of combat, you gain an extra turn after all other combatants have taken theirs.
